name: peruse
description: A simple platform for creating highly readable single-page client-side online books.

scripts.build-assets: cp peruse.css build/; cp icons/* build/
scripts.build-test: rm build/*; browserify -g [ babelify --presets [ @babel/preset-env @babel/preset-react ] ] peruse.js | terser > build/peruse.js; npm run build-assets
scripts.test: npm run clean; npm run build-assets; npm run build-test
scripts.build-prod: browserify -g uglifyify -t [ babelify --presets [ @babel/preset-env @babel/preset-react ] ] peruse.js | terser --compress --mangle > build/peruse.js
scripts.ship: set -e -o pipefail; npm run clean; npm run build-assets; npm run build-prod; npm run sync
scripts.build-app: node ./esbuild.config.js; cp src/index.html public/; cp -R src/images public/; cp -R src/style public/
